mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( order_id, user_id, plan_code, order_name, customer_name, original_amount, used_point, amount, status, requested_at ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{planCode}, #{orderName}, #{customerName}, #{originalAmount}, #{usedPoint}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{requestedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, user_id, plan_code, payment_key, order_name, customer_name, original_amount, used_point, amount, status, requested_at FROM payments WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT order_id, user_id, plan_code, payment_key, order_name, customer_name, original_amount, used_point, amount, status, requested_at FROM payments WHERE payment_key = #{paymentKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE payments SET status = #{status}, canceled_at = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
